summary: Tom Berninger chronicles his time spent on the road as a member of the tour crew for The National, the rock & roll band fronted by his brother, Matt.
cast: Matt Berninger|Aaron Dessner|Bryce Dessner|Bryan Devendorf|Scott Devendorf|Brandon Reid|Carin Besser|Isla Berninger|Nancy Berninger|Paul Berninger|Barack Obama|Dawn Barger|Tom Berninger|Annie Clark|Ira Kaplan|Benjamin Lanz|Dave Nelson|Padma Newsome|Kyle Resnick|Will Arnett|Lucas Cotterman|Werner Herzog|John Krasinski
keywords: heavy metal|singer|indie rock|rock band|post it note
title: Mistaken for Strangers
